Package com.softwaresmithy

Class Summary
BookJB A simple javabean for doing psuedo ORM with the SQLite database.
DownloadDataTask Capsule class to perform network operations to gather metadata in a background thread, and off the android UI thread.
EditItem Simple activity for manually editing metadata through a UI screen.
ImageCursorAdapter A custom cursor adapter to generate item entries for each of the objects in the passed cursor.
